GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object for the provided user ID

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews - can include any combination of queries

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an array of a single review for the provided review ID

review.title: JengARRGGGH!
review.review_body: Few games are equiped to fill a player with such a defined sense of mild-peril, but a friendly game of Jenga will turn the mustn't-make-it-fall anxiety all the way up to 11! Fiddly fun for all the family, this game needs little explaination. Whether you're a player who chooses to play it safe, or one who lives life on the edge, eventually the removal of blocks will destabilise the tower and all your Jenga dreams come tumbling down.

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for the provided review ID

comments.author: grumpy19
comments.body: Ex id ipsum dolore non cillum anim sint duis nisi anim deserunt nisi minim.

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: adds a new review comment for the provided review ID

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: increments votes by submitted amount the provided review ID

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes comment associated with the provided comment ID
